statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 6 \\ -6 \\ -7 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 26 \\ -18 \\ 16 \\ 18 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -67 \\ 48 \\ -38 \\ -41 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
